Fall_River.Church of Christ, Swansea: Church of Christ, Swansea (also known as First Christian Congregational Church and Swansea White Church) is an historic church at 1113 G. A. R. Highway (United States Route 6) in Swansea, Massachusetts. The current Greek Revival church building was built in 1833 for a congregation with a recorded history of meetings dating to 1680. The church was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1990.
